name: newline_at_region_bottom
description: Newline at bottom of scroll region scrolls region up, preserving rows outside
comment: Row 0: A, Row 1: B, Row 2: C, Row 3: D, Row 4: E. Set scroll region 2;4 (rows 1-3 0-based). CUP(4,1) to (3,0) at bottom of region, CR+LF triggers scroll: C→row1, D→row2, row3 blank. Print X at (3,0).
